SEARCH
Module se1.bestellsystem
Package components

Interface Formatter

public interface Formatter
Public interface of the formatter-component that provides text formatting methods including a Formatter.TableFormatter that produces text in a table format.
Version:
"F12-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT"
Author:
"sgraupner"

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    Formatter.TableFormatter
    Public interface of the TableFormatter-component that produces text in form of a table defined by columns of specified width and alignment.

  • Method Details

    • fmtPrice

      String fmtPrice(long price, Pricing.Currency currency, int... style)
      Format long value to price according to a format (0 is default): 
       Example: long value: 499
 style: 0: "4.99"
        1: "4.99 EUR"     3: "4.99 €"
        2: "4.99EUR"      4: "4.99€"
      Parameters:
      price - long value as price
      currency - Pricing.Currency to obtain currency three-letter code or Unicode
      style - price formatting style
      Returns:
      price formatted according to selcted style

    • fmtDecimal

      String fmtDecimal(long value, int decimalDigits, String... unit)
      Format long value to a decimal String with specified digit formatting: 
            {      "%,d", 1L },     // no decimal digits:  16,000Y
      { "%,d.%01d", 10L },
      { "%,d.%02d", 100L },   // double-digit price: 169.99E
      { "%,d.%03d", 1000L },  // triple-digit unit:  16.999-
      Parameters:
      value - value to format to String in decimal format
      decimalDigits - number of digits
      unit - appended unit as String
      Returns:
      decimal value formatted according to specified digit formatting

    • createTableFormatter

      Formatter.TableFormatter createTableFormatter(String... fmtArgs)
      Create a Formatter.TableFormatter with String.format(fmt) specifiers for each column.
      Examples of fmt-specifiers: 
        - "|%-10s|",        -- column with left and right border of width 10 (String)
  - " %-28s",         -- column with space to the left, no border of width 29 (String)
  - "| %6s", " %9s|"  -- two columns of widths 6 and 9 with borders left and right
      Parameters:
      fmtArgs - String.format(fmt) specifiers for each column
